results.title: Metformin, A New Era for an Old Drug in the Treatment of Immune Mediated Disease?
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To provide a critical and comprehensive review of the available literature describing the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the immune system and on @<m>DISEASE_Positive_Pressure_Respiration_Intrinsic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018467 @@@auto-inflammatory diseases@@@.
